s.text: She returned to her watch, regarding her own reflection in the long window.
She used the discretion of the mirrored window to secretively survey her crew.

He says we should come through now, immediately, before the probe is reported late."
"Tarrin says the planet's a freaking gemstone!
At six foot two, she stood a full head taller than even her Arrallin first officer.
At six foot two, she stood a full head taller than even her Arrallin first officer.
Rakal, her first officer, was staring pensively at his panel.

It would be a shame to lose that talent, though.
She returned to her watch, regarding her own reflection in the long window.
His pointed ears swiveled back and forth, catching every sound from the bridge, while his long tail swished to the rhythm of his thoughts.
Only those of the Arrallin Insurrection inner team knew he was no common 'beta furry'.
Only those of the Arrallin Insurrection inner team knew he was no common 'beta furry'.
She had the look of every leader she had ever known.
His eyes had been treated and darkened to a rich purple to disguise the brilliant golden yellow color that would mark him as an Alpha Arrallin, and leader of his hive.
